representation_information.name: NetCDF-4C (Network Common Data Form, version 4), Classic Model
representation_information.description: A platform-independent file format for storing scientific data, supporting annotated multidimensional arrays, including support for parallel I/O, data compression, and chunked storage. Combines data model of netCDF-3 and storage architecture of netCDF-4.

relation.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
